definition: of or relating to the mind, of or relating to the total emotional and intellectual response of an individual to external reality
of or relating to intellectual as contrasted with emotional activity
of, relating to, or being intellectual as contrasted with overt physical activity
occurring or experienced in the mind : inner
relating to the mind, its activity, or its products as an object of study : ideological
relating to spirit or idea as opposed to matter
examples: the distinction between physical things and mental ideas

definition: of, relating to, or affected by a psychiatric disorder, mentally disordered : mad, crazy
examples: was going a bit mental from old age

definition: intended for the care or treatment of persons affected by psychiatric disorders
of or relating to telepathic or mind-reading powers
of or relating to the chin : genial
